1.text: Fill in the blanks with suitable adverbs given above.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Fill in the blanks with suitable adverbs given above.</prosody></speak>

2.text: 1. The train went ....................... and they arrived at Jaffna by 12.30 p.m. 2. Raj and his family members welcomed them ....................................... 3. They treated Nirmal and his family members ...................................... 4. On the last day they said "Good bye" to each other ............................... 5. They enjoyed their tour ...............................................
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. The train went ....................... and they arrived at <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='d͡ʒafna'>Jaffna</phoneme> by 12.30 p.m. 2. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rad͡ʒ'>Raj</phoneme> and his family members welcomed them ....................................... 3. They treated <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='nirmal'>Nirmal</phoneme> and his family members ...................................... 4. On the last day they said "Good bye" to each other ............................... 5. They enjoyed their tour ...............................................</prosody></speak>

3.text: Ruvini visited many places in Jaffna. Amaya and Rajesh also had visited different places during the vacation. These are the articles that they wrote for their class wallpaper.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ruvini'>Ruvini</phoneme> visited many places in <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='d͡ʒafna'>Jaffna</phoneme>. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='amaja'>Amaya</phoneme> and <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rad͡ʒeʃ'>Rajesh</phoneme> also had visited different places during the vacation. These are the articles that they wrote for their class wallpaper.</prosody></speak>

5.text: "Neduntheev" is an island of the Northern Province. It is also known by its Dutch name Delft. It is an island located in the Palk Strait. The island's area is 50 km² and it is roughly oval-shaped. Neduntheev is a flat island surrounded by shallow waters and beaches of coral chunks and sand. The vegetation consists of palmyrah palms, dry shrubs and grass that grow on the soil. In the
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>"Neduntheev" is an island of the Northern Province. It is also known by its Dutch name Delft. It is an island located in the Palk Strait. The island's area is 50 km² and it is roughly oval-shaped. Neduntheev is a flat island surrounded by shallow waters and beaches of coral chunks and sand. The vegetation consists of palmyrah palms, dry shrubs and grass that grow on the soil. In the</prosody></speak>

6.text: western coast of the island there are remains of a 1000 year old ancient temple built by the Chola Dynasty, as well as the ruins of a Dutch colonial fort. The island should be reached by sea and it takes about one hour to reach the destination. The local people earn their living by fishing and selling palmyrah products. It was an unforgettable journey as the island is famous for its unspoiled natural beauty.
